pr_title: Issue #1727 - added error handling to ConstraintGenerator.getTypes(...)

timeline.message:
Issue #1727 - added error handling to ConstraintGenerator.getTypes(...)

Signed-off-by: John T.E. Timm <johntimm@us.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: indexOf('char') would probably be preferred here
timeline.author: prb112

replies.bodyText: Since the constraint is compiled one time, I think it's a nominal benefit
replies.author: prb112

replies.bodyText:
Per the Sonar link:
https://rules.sonarsource.com/java/RSPEC-3027?search=indexOf
It looks like this rule has been deprecated likely because modern compilers already do the optimization.
replies.author: JohnTimm
